title: @Riot KateyKhaos. Can we expect the next ultimate skin soon-ish or not for a while?
body:
It's been about a year since DJ Sona came out. So the next Ultimate skin should be coming. I was wondering if you could give us a rough estimate of how long it would be. Say, could we expect it before summer, or not until fall/early next winter.
I don't need anything exact, just want to know if I should keep my hopes up and check the PBE for it every two weeks. Or not have to expect it for a while.

Also, any hints on what role it is for?

Thanks for taking the time to read this.

replies.body: Dragon trainer Tristana.
DTT is a legendary skin, not an ultimate skin.
You'll have to forgive me, I'm unaware of the difference.

Ultimate skins are usually transforming skins with multiple models and altered visuals for each form. Legendary skins are meant to offer an entirely different theme for the champion that's different from their base theme. Something like that anyway.

Essentially ultimate skins are super ultra mega legendary skins.

We've only had 3 ultimate skins: Pulsefire Ezreal, Spiritguard Udyr and DJ Sona.
I see. Interesting.

TL;DR - Yes, there will definitely be more Sion skins. Now that he's been updated, we have a brand new model to work with! He's certainly been brought up in ideations before.
